item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Suppliers development
item.description: In this section you will find information related to the connectivity with a supplier who integrates with TravelgateX API. The full information about the different requests you will receive from TravelgateX system are specified in the API Methods section. The information described in this section is just for suppliers developing TravelgateX’s API. <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/legacy/hotel/how-to-guides/suppliers/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/legacy/hotel/how-to-guides/suppliers/configuration/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Configuration</h3> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/legacy/hotel/how-to-guides/suppliers/connectivity/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Connectivity</h3> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/connectiontypesbuyers/legacy/hotel/how-to-guides/suppliers/errors/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Errors</h3> </div> </div> </a>
